author: Reuters Editorial
title: TABLE-Foreign trading in Japan stocks for latest week
text:
TOKYO, April 5 (Reuters) - Weekly net trading in shares on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange, Japanâ€™s main stock exchange, in thousands of yen. A negative figure indicates net selling. Week to: TOTAL Proprietary Brokerage Mar 30 12,961,024 13,047,189 -86,165 Mar 23 -14,686,695 852,290 -15,538,985 Mar 16 475,344 214,757,239 -214,281,895 Mar 9 -10,885,836 112,117,504 -123,003,340 Mar 2 -16,991,531 -140,903,457 123,911,926
